channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- wpb-show-core
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- wpb-show-core

item.title: CVE-2023-4922|2024-08-02T07:44:52.210Z -- unknown -- wpb-show-core
item.description: The WPB Show Core WordPress plugin through 2.2 is vulnerable to a local file inclusion via the `path` parameter.

item.title: CVE-2023-5974|2024-08-02T08:14:25.129Z -- unknown -- wpb-show-core
item.description: The WPB Show Core WordPress plugin through 2.2 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF) via the `path` parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-1956|2024-08-01T18:56:22.681Z -- unknown -- wpb-show-core
item.description: The wpb-show-core WordPress plugin before 2.7 does not sanitise and escape the parameters before outputting it back in the response of an unauthenticated request, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting

item.title: CVE-2024-1292|2024-08-01T18:33:25.542Z -- unknown -- wpb-show-core
item.description: The WPB Show Core WordPress plugin before 2.7 does not sanitise and escape some parameters before outputting them back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin

item.title: CVE-2024-1958|2024-08-01T18:56:22.557Z -- unknown -- wpb-show-core
item.description: The WPB Show Core WordPress plugin before 2.7 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin or unauthenticated users
